att.name: defaultComputerOuDn
att.description: Distinguished Name of the OU where new VMs are placed by default. Overridden by the ActiveDirectory.OU custom property.

att.name: alsoDeleteComputerSubtree
att.description: True performs a more thorough deletion of the Computer object

att.name: adDomainName
att.description: AD domain (FQDN) - "Verify" workflow will make sure Cust Spec successfully joined this domain.
